parts.text: {"word":"irritate","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"いらいらさせる、怒らせる、むかつかせる","english_definition":"to make someone annoyed, impatient, or angry.","examples":[{"sentence":"His constant complaining really irritates me.","translation":"彼の絶え間ない不満は本当に私をイライラさせる。"},{"sentence":"It irritates me when people talk loudly on their cell phones in public.","translation":"公共の場で携帯電話で大声で話す人がいるとイライラする。"},{"sentence":"Don't irritate him when he's trying to concentrate.","translation":"彼が集中しようとしているときに、イライラさせないで。"}],"collocations":["irritate someone (人をイライラさせる)","irritate greatly (ひどくイライラさせる)","irritate slightly (少しイライラさせる)"],"synonyms":["annoy","bother","vex","exasperate","provoke","aggravate"],"antonyms":["please","soothe","calm","pacify"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（身体の一部を）炎症させる、刺激する、かぶれさせる","english_definition":""to cause inflammation, soreness, or itching in a part of the body.","examples":[{"sentence":"The chemicals in the soap irritated her skin.","translation":"石鹸の化学物質が彼女の肌を刺激した。"},{"sentence":"The dust irritated his eyes.","translation":"ほこりが彼の目を刺激した。"},{"sentence":"Wearing tight shoes can irritate your feet.","translation":"きつい靴を履くと足が炎症を起こすことがある。"}],"collocations":["irritate the skin (皮膚を刺激する)","irritate the eyes (目を刺激する)","irritate a wound (傷を刺激する)"],"synonyms":["inflame","aggravate","chafe","itch","inflame"],"antonyms":["soothe","relieve","alleviate","heal"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「irritare」（刺激する、興奮させる）に由来。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈɪrɪteɪt/","syllables":"ir-ri-tate"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["irritate","irritates"],"past_simple":"irritated","past_participle":"irritated","present_participle":"irritating"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**irritate**」は、人や状況を「イライラさせる」という意味と、身体の一部を「刺激する」という意味の2つの主要な意味があります。感情的な意味では、軽度の不快感から強い怒りまで、さまざまな程度のイライラを表すことができます。物理的な意味では、皮膚や目を刺激するなど、炎症や不快感を引き起こすことを指します。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I'm irritated of him.","correct":"✓ I'm irritated by him.","note":"人をイライラさせる原因を示す場合は、「irritated by」を使用します。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The smoke is irritating my nose. I need to sneeze.","correct":"✓ The smoke is irritating my nose. It makes me want to sneeze.","note":"The first sentence is grammatically correct, but the second sentence is more natural. The second sentence uses the phrase 'makes me want to sneeze' which is more common."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["irritation (名詞: いらだち、刺激)","irritating (形容詞: いらいらさせる)","irritable (形容詞: いらいらしやすい)","irritability (名詞: いらいらしやすさ)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度","priority":"★★☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**irritate**」は、誰かを怒らせたり、不快にさせたり、または体の特定の部分に炎症や不快感を引き起こすことを意味する動詞です。感情的な意味では、軽度の不快感から強い怒りまで、さまざまな程度のいらだちを表すことができます。物理的な意味では、皮膚や目を刺激するなど、炎症や不快感を引き起こすことを指します。例えば、「His constant complaining really irritates me.（彼の絶え間ない不満は本当に私をイライラさせる。）」のように使います。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The loud music started to **irritate** me.","translation":"騒々しい音楽が私をイライラさせ始めた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"いらいらさせる"},{"sentence":"Certain fabrics can **irritate** sensitive skin.","translation":"特定の生地は敏感肌を刺激することがある。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"刺激する"},{"sentence":"It **irritates** me when people are late.","translation":"人が遅刻するとイライラする。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"いらいらさせる"},{"sentence":"The smoke from the fire **irritated** her eyes.","translation":"火の煙が彼女の目を刺激した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"刺激する"}]}
